T11bsa061_u:10: bāhyārthavādinaḥ kila vijñānamātratāyāṃ santānāntarasattā nopapadyata iti codayanti /
T11bsa061_u:11: tathāhi, ta evamāhuḥ - yeṣāṃ cittamātrameva sat, asaṃśca
T11bsa061_u:15: atha kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ prāṇyantaramanumīyate cet; vijñānamātratāpakṣe kāyavākkarmaṇorvijñaptī
T11bsa061_u:17: nāpyāgamaḥ sambhavati, tasya rūpaskandhāntarbhāvāt, etasya ca pratikṣepāt
T11bsa061_u:18: / tathāhi, āgamaḥ śabdātmako vā bhaved vyañjanasvabhāvo vā /
T11bsa061_u:23: sati, āgamādapi prāṇyantaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śakyata iti cet?
T11bsa061_u:29: sa tu pratipattṛsantāne sannapyupacāratastathāgatasya vā kapilasya vā kaṇādasya vā karturvacanamiti vyapadiśyate /
T11bsa061_u:30: evaṃ sarve 'pi bauddhā vācakaṃ śabdasāmānyākāraṃ jñānaṃ manyante; na cāsti śabdaviśeṣaḥ,
T11bsa061_u:38: sā cātra gamanāgamanasaṃlāpecchārūpā parigṛhyate, kriyāhetutvāt tasyāḥ /
T11bsa061_u:39: sāsti pūrvaṃ yasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sā buddhipūrvā /
T11bsa061_u:42: yadi nāma bāhyārthavādibhiḥ svasantāne tāṃ buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāmupalabhya paścātparasantāne grahād vivakṣitarūpā dhīḥ vijñānaṃ gamyate, tadā cittamātre 'pyeṣa nayaḥ samaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:47: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanād yadi
T11bsa061_u:54: tenāyamartho bhavati - ātmani jigamiṣāvivakṣāpūrvayoḥ kriyābhilāpayordarśanāt parasantāne 'pi tau kriyābhilāpau copalabhya cittaspandanamanumīyata iti cet? cittamātratāvāde
T11bsa061_u:61: nanu bāhyārthavāde tu paracittanimittake kāyavākkarmaṇī liṅgatvena
T11bsa061_u:62: svīkriyete, antarjñeyavāde tayorabhāvāt kathaṃ sāmyamiti cet? evamāha -
T11bsa061_u:63: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatītyevaṃ na matam
T11bsa061_u:65: antarjñeyavādināpi kāyavāgvijñāptipratibhāsi kāyavāgvijñaptakārakaṃ jñānaṃ paracittasya spandanaviśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatīti na manyate /
T11bsa061_u:68: viśeṣeti vacanena cikīrṣā, vivakṣā ca parigṛhyete // 3 //
T11bsa061_u:70: atha parajñānasya kriyāyā anupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet? na; tulyatvāt
T11bsa061_u:72: na bhavatā kadāpi parajñānapūrvake kriyāvāgākārake jñāne upalabhyete /
T11bsa061_u:77: yato hi, eṣa upālambho bhavatāmapi tulyaḥ //
T11bsa061_u:79: paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati /
T11bsa061_u:82: bāhyārthavādyapi paracittaspandanapūrvakau tau kriyābhilāpau na kadāpi paśyati /
T11bsa061_u:85: na hi samarthanāya prasiddhasambandho 'nvekṣaṇīyaḥ, api tu doṣasāmyādeva paro nigṛhītaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:88: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata it cet? kiṃ na yujyate? ātmanaścittasya paravartinorityādi /
T11bsa061_u:89: yasmādātmanaścittaṃ santānāntaravartinoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ kāraṇatvena na yujyate, tasmātparacittamanumīyata iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
T11bsa061_u:96: parasantānabartinau kriyābhilāpau ātmacittanimittakau vā syātām, paracittanimittakau veti dvidhā parīkṣā /
T11bsa061_u:97: na tāvadātmacittaminittakau, yasmānna svasantāne tayorsamutthāpakacoittasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavati // 7 //
T11bsa061_u:102: gacchāmi, ahaṃ vadāmīti ye svacittanimittake kāravākkarmaṇī te svasantāne upalabhyete /
T11bsa061_u:109: paravartikriyābhilāpāvapi yadyātmacittaśrayiṇau syātām, tadā tāvapi ātmani
T11bsa061_u:122: svacittaspandananimittake vijñāptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittāditpadyete /
T11bsa061_u:124: ye svacittaspandananimittake kriyāvākpratibhāsinī jñāne te cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī 'ahaṃ gacchami, ahaṃ vadāmi'
T11bsa061_u:126: parasantānavartinī tu 'ayaṃ gacchami, ayaṃ vadati' iti bahirmukhapratibhāsinī pratīyete
T11bsa061_u:128: svacittasya spandanaṃ svacittaspandanam, tannimittaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ // 12 //
T11bsa061_u:132: ye bahirmukhapratibhāsinī jñāne te 'nimitte iti kinneṣyete? na spandananimittale iti vākyaśeṣaḥ
T11bsa061_u:136: bhavatu kila nimittāmātrasya pratiṣedhaḥ tathāpi prakaraṇavaśāt spandanamātrasya pratiṣedho draṣṭavyaḥ // 13 //
T11bsa061_u:140: yadi vicchinnapratibhāsinī kriyāvāgākārake jñāne spandanābhāve 'pi vinā kiṃcana kriyāvāgākāraṃ bhavet, tadā sarvāṇyapi kriyāvāgākārakāṇi jñānāni spandanena vinā bhaveyuḥ; viśeṣābhāvādityabhiprāyaḥ tatra yadyevaṃ vicintyeta -
T11bsa061_u:148: sa tu yato na jñānayoḥ spandanatvanimittasya bhedakaḥ;
T11bsa061_u:149: bahirmukhapratibhāsinī spandananimittake na bhavataḥ, itare tu spandananimittake iti /
T11bsa061_u:151: atha nimittatvabhedābhāve ko doṣaḥ syāt? āha -
T11bsa061_u:154: yato hyatra bhinnabhūtayoḥ jñānayoḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsatve na kaścid viśeṣo 'sti /
T11bsa061_u:155: tasmād viśeṣābhāvādubhayamapi spandanatvanimittakaṃ na bhavet, atha vobhayamapi spandananimittakam tadevaṃ jñānadvayasya sāmyaṃ sādhayitvopasaṃharannāha -
T11bsa061_u:156: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
T11bsa061_u:159: yasmādevaṃ jñānadvayasya sāmyam, tasmād yo 'vicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kriyāvākpratibhāsaḥ sa kevalaṃ spandananimittako na bhavati /
T11bsa061_u:165: tenātrāyaṃ samudāyārthaḥ - vicchinnāvicchinnabhedamanapekṣya sāmānyena kriyābhilāpayoḥ pratibhāsamātraṃ spandananimittakam /
T11bsa061_u:166: yato hi kaścid vicchinno 'pi pratibhāsa spandanapūrvako dṛśyate,
T11bsa061_u:173: śaropalaprakṣepaṇāni yantraṃ ca nirmāṇaṃ ca parapracālanaṃ cetivigrahaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:181: bhavatu eteṣāṃ kriyāviśeṣāṇāṃ vicchinnaḥ pratibhāsaḥ, tathāpi spandanapūrvakatvam /
T11bsa061_u:190: etaduktaṃ bhavati - bhavantu ete svadehasambaddhāḥ, tathāpi nātmaspandanapūrvakā iti // tadevamubhayatrāpi vyabhicārasadbhāvaṃ sādhayitvopasaṃharannāha -
T11bsa061_u:191: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiriti yujyate /
T11bsa061_u:193: yasmādevamubhayatra vyabhicārasadbhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ, tasmāt kriyāvākyapratibhāsamātreṇa paracittamanumātuṃ
T11bsa061_u:199: spandanatvapūrvakāḥ; tadanyā vicchinnapratibhāsāstu na tathā syuḥ?
T11bsa061_u:200: tasmādāha - tatra yadi kasyacidapūrvakatvam, na ko 'pi tatpūrvaka syāt;
T11bsa061_u:203: yadi vicchinnāvicchinnajñānayoranyatarat spandanatvanibandhanaṃ neṣyate, tadā kimapi spandanatvapūrvakaṃ na syāt /
T11bsa061_u:209: yato hi yadi kasyacidatatpūrvakatvaṃ bhavet sarvasyātatpūrvakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
T11bsa061_u:216: kriyābhilāpamātreṇa spandanamātramanumeyam, na tu spandanaviśeṣam; viśeṣe liṅgasya vyabhiucāraditi bāhyārthavādena samānatāṃ darśayitumāha -
T11bsa061_u:217: tatra yathā kriyāmupalabhya, ātmani spandanānupalambhādanyatra spandapratītiḥ; tathā kriyāpratibhāsopalambhane 'pi /
T11bsa061_u:220: ātmani spandanānupalambhāt sāmarthyādanyatra spandanamanumīyata iti cet /
T11bsa061_u:221: antarjñeyavāde 'pi tattulyam; kriyāpratibhāsamupalabhya, ātmani spandanānupalambhāt sāmarthyādanyatra spandanamanumīyate // 23 //
T11bsa061_u:226: bāhyārthavādyapi prāṇyantarasaṃbaddhapratibhāsinau kriyābhilāpau animittakāviti necchati // bāhyārthavādyanimittau nābhyupagacchati /
T11bsa061_u:227: tadavaśyamabhyupagantavyamiti darśayitumāha - tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
T11bsa061_u:229: tathāvipratipannena bāhyārthavādināvaśyamiyamupapattirvaktavyā - tayoḥ kriyābhilāpayoḥ spandanajanyarūpatvāt spandanābhāve tau na bhavata iti // 25 //
T11bsa061_u:234: antarjñeyavādyapi tathaiva vadet - vicchinnapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyarūpatvāttadabhāve na bhavata iti /
T11bsa061_u:235: tathā sati nānayoḥ bāhyārthavādāntarjñeyavādayoḥ parasparaṃ bhedo
T11bsa061_u:238: spandanajanyarūpatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadati,
T11bsa061_u:239: tathaivāntarjñeyavādyapi bāhirmukhapratibhāsijñāne spandanajanyatvāt tadabhāve na bhavata iti vadet /
T11bsa061_u:246: kriyābhilāpapratibhāsijñānayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ vadan yogācāraḥ svapnāvasthāyāmapi tayoḥ spandananimittakatvaṃ kinna vadatīti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā // 27 //
T11bsa061_u:249: paro 'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyāvācau spandananimittike iti kinna vadati?
T11bsa061_u:252: kiṃ tarhi? etadapi pūrveṇa saha sarvaṃ samānamiti śeṣaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:255: bāhyārthavādyapi svapnāvasthāyāṃ yau parasambaddhau kriyābhilāpāvupalabhyete tau paracittanimittakāviti kinna vadati // 28 //
T11bsa061_u:267: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasyārthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
T11bsa061_u:275: antarjñeyavādīnāṃ mate 'pitasmāt middhena bhrāntatvādeva parādhipatyarahite kriyābhilāpākāreke jñāne jāyete itīṣṭam // 32 //
T11bsa061_u:276: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikena saha samānatāṃ pratipādya vaibhāṣikamatāśaṅkyāha
T11bsa061_u:277: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānānyapi santānāntarāṇyeva iti cet /
T11bsa061_u:279: svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāt svapnāvasthāyāṃ yeṣāṃ prāṇināmupalabdhirbhavati te ca sattvāḥ santyeva satyataḥ /
T11bsa061_u:283: samāśriyeta, tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parādhipatyaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
T11bsa061_u:285: yaḥ yuktyā āgamācca rahitaḥ sa yuktyāgamarahitaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:289: tamabhyupagaccheyuḥ, anena ca mama parājaya iti /
T11bsa061_u:291: tadā yogācārabhimataṃ sattvasya tathāvidhaparadhipatyamapi na kaścinnivārayet /
T11bsa061_u:292: tathāhi, bhavadbhiḥ svapnāvasthāyāṃ ye sattvāḥ abhyupagatāḥ,
T11bsa061_u:293: teṣāmevādhipatyādasmākaṃ vijñaptipratibhāsāḥ jāyanta iti vaktavyaṃ bhavet
T11bsa061_u:294: / tena hi yad viṣamatvaṃ yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ tadevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T11bsa061_u:297: tathā sati svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sapratighatvaṃ sanidarśanatvañca bhavet /
T11bsa061_u:298: tena hi hastyādīnāṃ gavākṣādiṣu praveśo nopapadyeta, taddeśasthairapi dṛśyo bhavet /
T11bsa061_u:299: atha sanidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ ca neṣyate, tadā rūpameva tanna bhavet /
T11bsa061_u:302: yadātmānaṃ bahirgataṃ prekṣate,tadā santānasya dvitvamapi prasajyeta /
T11bsa061_u:306: svapnadṛṣṭarūpasya sadbhāvābhyupagame tvevemādayo bahavo doṣā prasajyante
T11bsa061_u:307: evaṃ tāvat samānatāṃ prasādhya svapakṣe yuktyāgamarahitatvaṃ parihartumāha
T11bsa061_u:308: etat keṣāñcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
T11bsa061_u:312: keṣāzncid yogācārāṇāṃ mata eva jāgradavasthāvat svapne 'pi tathāvidhānī kriyāvāgākārajñānāni parasantānā yattāni bhavanti /
T11bsa061_u:322: devādyadhiṣṭhānataḥ supriyavaṇijo vijñaptipratibhāsīni jñānāni jāyante ādītyanena yogipiśācādīnāmadhiṣṭhānāni saṃgṛhītāni // 37 //
T11bsa061_u:331: muhurbhavataiva paryanuyujyate - kasmāt bhavatparikalpitayā tayā kriyayā paracittaṃ jñāyate tathā paryanuyoge sautrāntika āha -
T11bsa061_u:336: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittantare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate?
T11bsa061_u:337: tasya kāryatvamityādi kriyā cittasya kāryatvāccittasya gamiketi cet?
T11bsa061_u:338: cittasya tatkāryatvaṃ tu kriyāpratibhāsijñāne 'pi tulyatvāttena kriyāpratibhāsenāpi kasmāt paracittaṃ na jñāyate // 41 //
T11bsa061_u:340: api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet,
T11bsa061_u:343: kiñceyaṃ kriyā sattāmātrāt paracittamavabodhayed ohosvit jñānāt? yadi tāvad sattāmātrāditi, tadā kriyāmanupalabhyamānenāpi prāṇinā paracitta pratipadyeta // 42 //
T11bsa061_u:347: na hi liṅgaṃ sattāmātrāt gamakaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa061_u:352: tadā tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā, kriyātaḥ jñānam,
T11bsa061_u:354: tadā tatretyādi syānmatam - liṅga jñānamapekṣya gamakamiti /
T11bsa061_u:355: hanta, tarhi na kiñcit prayojanamanayā paramparayā /
T11bsa061_u:358: paramparā tu paracittāt kriyā utpadyate, kriyātaḥ
T11bsa061_u:375: spandanamātrasāmānyāṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa lāraṇasya gatiḥ /
T11bsa061_u:380: ata eva uktam - kāryeṇa karaṇasya gati iti /
T11bsa061_u:383: evaṃ sāmānyena kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nirdiśya kāryasya bhedamupadarśayitumāha
T11bsa061_u:387: ātmaspandanātsamutthitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tasyāntarmukhapratibhāsatayā vṛttiḥ, paraspandanātsamutthitasya tu bahirmukhapratibhāsatayā /
T11bsa061_u:393: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:401: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanādinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate, na tu atyantāsadābhogāt /
T11bsa061_u:404: yathāsvamityanena svapnasya middhaviśeṣaḥ, narakādeḥ karmavipākāvasthā ca parogṛhyate /
T11bsa061_u:410: ādītyanena mukhakāntiraktimādīnāṃ janakacittasya paroigrahaḥ paraspandanādi ca nimittaṃ ceti samāsaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:412: yasya kriyādipratibhāsivijñānasya tadanyasmāt spandanādinimittādudbhavituṃ śīlamasti tat paraspandādinimittodbhūtavijñānam
T11bsa061_u:414: parābhogaḥ paramanaskāraḥ ādītyanena tatkālabhāvināṃ tadanyapratyayānāṃ parigrahaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:422: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyāmapi kriyāpratibhāsijñānānāṃ spandananimittakatvaṃ sādhayitvā upasaṃhartum āha -
T11bsa061_u:424: tasmāt sarvāvasthāsvityādi yasmādevamavyabhicāritvaṃ sādhitam, tasmāt svāpajāgradubhayorapyavasthayoḥ kriyāpratibhāsāt cittaspandanamanumīyata eveti sthitam /
T11bsa061_u:427: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syāt pratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
T11bsa061_u:430: pratipattiḥ, tanmate svpnādāvapi kriyātaḥ spandanasya pratipattirbhavet /
T11bsa061_u:431: atha svapne kriyātaḥ spandanasya pratipattirneṣyeta, tadā tat jāgradavasthāyāmapi yujyeta na kadāciyt kriyātaḥ spandanasya
T11bsa061_u:446: ālambanaṃ tu spandanābhāve 'pyutpadyate, na tu kriyā /
T11bsa061_u:456: yasya vyapadeśasya santi sarve prakārāḥ sa sarvaprakāravyapadeśaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:458: jāgradavasthāyāṃ tu sārthamityetat jñānam, adhikāro vā bhavatā kuto
T11bsa061_u:459: labdhaḥ? evamuktaṃ bhavati - jāgradavasthāvat svapnāvasthāyāmapi dṛśyākārādayaḥ sarve santi
T11bsa061_u:470: yadi bhrāntivaśādavasthānyathābhāvādarthaśūnyaṃ jñānaṃ jāyata iti abhyupāgamyeta, tadā mahābhramarājñyā
T11bsa061_u:471: sadbhāvāt tadvaśācca sarvāṇi jñānānyarthaśūnyāni jāyanta iti manyeran //
T11bsa061_u:473: tathā satyarthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttareṇaikena nihatā bhavanti /
T11bsa061_u:478: yasmārthāntaravādasya aneke avatārāḥ doṣāḥ parihāralakṣaṇenāśakyanigūhanāḥ santyamī anekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāḥ
T11bsa061_u:483: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yadāvidyopaplutatvāt sarveṣāṃ jñānānāmarthaśūnyatvamabhyupagamyate, tadārthāntaravādasya ye 'nekāśakyanigūhanāvatārāsta uttareṇaikena nirākṛtā bhavanti // evaṃ santānāntarasiddhiṃ parisamāpyāvaśiṣṭān durupālambhān parihartukāmaḥ paramatamāśaṅkitum āha -
T11bsa061_u:484: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
T11bsa061_u:493: bhavadbhiriṣṭe, kathaṃ te vaktuḥ vijñaptī syātām? atra santāneti śrotuḥ
T11bsa061_u:502: nocyate paracittasamitthitavijñaptirūpatvāt tatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
T11bsa061_u:507: sā yasya pratibhāsino jñānasya rūpaṃ svabhāvo 'sti tattathā /
T11bsa061_u:511: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yasmāt tatra pratibhāsi jñānaṃ paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpam, tasmāt samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti vayamapi nābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:513: nābhyupagamyate, kiṃ tarhi abhyupagamyata iti cet? āha - kiṃ tarhi? tasya kāryatvād iti /
T11bsa061_u:517: yadi śrotṛsantānājjāte kriyāvāgākārake jñāne vijñaptitvena neṣyete, kā punaranyā vijñaptiścet
T11bsa061_u:521: samutthāpakacittasantānājjāte ye kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
T11bsa061_u:522: evamuktaṃ bhavati - vaktureva ye gamanābhilāpane kriyāvāgākārake jñāne te vijñaptīti ucyete samutthāpakacittaṃ svaparasantānagatayoḥ kriyāvāgākārakajñāneyoryathā kāraṇabhāvo bhavati taddarśayitumāha -
T11bsa061_u:536: vijñapteryadupādānakāraṇaṃ tena te santānāntarasambaddhakriyāvāgākārake jñāne janite /
T11bsa061_u:537: tajjanisambandhena tena hetunā upacārād vijñaptīti vyapadiśyete // 63 //
T11bsa061_u:539: na hi śrotā vaktṛsantānājjāte kriyāvākpratibhāsijñāne upalabhate /
T11bsa061_u:540: tathā hi, vaktā śrotā cobhāvapi svasvapratibhāsamanu bhavataḥ /
T11bsa061_u:567: tathā hi, vaktā caivaṃ cintayati - yanmayā kathitaṃ tat śrotrā jñātam /
T11bsa061_u:571: ekahetunā samutthāpakena ye sambhūte te ekahetusambhūte /
T11bsa061_u:574: tathāpi tayoḥ ya ekahetusambhūte kriyāvāgākārakajñāne ta ekārthapratītiniyamād vijñaptitvena vyapadiśyete /
T11bsa061_u:577: ekaḥ taimirikaḥ dvitīyaṃ taimirikaṃ 'paśya' iti "aparaṃ candraṃ' darśayati /
T11bsa061_u:585: kiñca kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yatparacittajñānaṃ tatparacittaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna? viṣayīkaraṇe 'rthāntaraṃ syāt /
T11bsa061_u:586: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate? tatsvarūpājñāne tatsiddherasambhavāditi
T11bsa061_u:591: tasmājjātaṃ kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yat paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkaroti āhosvinneti dvidhā parīkṣā /
T11bsa061_u:593: yadi nāma viṣayīkaroti, tadā tasya viṣayaḥ pṛthak syāt /
T11bsa061_u:595: atha na viṣayīkaroti, tadā kathaṃ paracittasattā jñāyate? kathaṃ na jñāyate? āha - tatsvarūpājñāna ityādi /
T11bsa061_u:597: sa tu tadabhāve na bhavatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ // 65 //
T11bsa061_u:602: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittapratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavattadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
T11bsa061_u:603: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham /
T11bsa061_u:605: kiñca yadā bāhyārthāvādibhiḥ kriyāvāgbhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ paracittaṃ jñāyate, tadā tasya paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna? yadi nāma viṣayīkriyate, tadā paracittasyākāro 'pi jñāyeta atha na viṣayīkriyate, tadā tena jñānena pratipattrā vā kathaṃ jñāyeta? // 67 //
T11bsa061_u:607: atha liṅgāt sāmānyādhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet?
T11bsa061_u:609: yasmālliṅgaṃ sāmānyena vyāptam, na tu viśeṣeṇa /
T11bsa061_u:610: tasmātsāmānyameva jñāyate, na viśeṣa iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā // 68 //
T11bsa061_u:617: anyatvāvācyatvayorekatve tvanena tatsāmānyameva gṛhyeta, na paracittam /
T11bsa061_u:621: tasmāt kathamanena jñānena tat paracittaṃ jñāyate?
T11bsa061_u:625: tathā sati tadākārastāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktam /
T11bsa061_u:630: grahaṇamabhyupagamyate, tadā paracittākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta ityuktaṃ prāk // 71 //
T11bsa061_u:649: tena bhavatu prāmāṇyamiti cet? naiṣa nyāyaḥ // 74 //
T11bsa061_u:650: yadi pramāṇasya svalakṣaṇagrahaṇanibandhanatvaṃ neṣyate, tatkathamasya pramāṇyamiti cedāha
T11bsa061_u:653: na hyanumānena viṣayasvarūpasya grahaṇam, apitu abhipretārthāvisaṃvādakatvāt prāmāṇyamiṣyate
T11bsa061_u:656: tatra tvevaṃ yojanīyam - yadā pratibhāsādayo 'bhinnāḥ, tadā pramāṇameva na taditi /
T11bsa061_u:660: svarūpasyāgrahe 'pyabhipretārthāvisaṃvāditvādasya prāmāṇyam, na tu svalakṣaṇagrahaṇāditi syādevam - svalakṣaṇasyāgrahaṇe 'pyaparāparānumānena paracittamanumīyate /
T11bsa061_u:665: na hi dhūmādiliṅgājjātamanumānaṃ vahnyādeḥ svarūpasya grāhakatveneṣyate /
T11bsa061_u:667: yadyanumānaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, tadā pratyakṣeṇa tulyatvaṃ
T11bsa061_u:676: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgatārthasya prāpteḥ /
T11bsa061_u:679: taddvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya yadi punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttimabhilāṣavyāyāmānyatrānyatragamanādikāṃ kuryāt, tadā prāṇyantararādhipatyenāgato 'rthassaṃlāpādiḥ prāpyate /
T11bsa061_u:680: atha vā punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttimabhilāṣavyāyāmadeśāntaragamanādikāṃ kuryāt, tadā prāṇyantarādhipatyena agato 'rthaḥ saṃlāpāt /
T11bsa061_u:681: atha vā punaḥ punarvyahāre pravartanamiti saṃlāpādanu gṛhapraveśaḥ, tadanu āsanadānam, tadanu
T11bsa061_u:684: kiṃ punaruttaravyahārasādhanāya prāmāṇyamiṣyata iti cet? ata āha -
T11bsa061_u:690: yo lokaḥ tanmātraphalaṃ cintayati saḥ tanmātraphalacintakaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
T11bsa061_u:691: evamuktaṃ bhavati - yo laukikaprāṇyantarasattāmanuminoti, saḥ prāṇyantaradhipatyādāgatām arthakriyāṃ prāpnoti /
T11bsa061_u:697: tathā pratibhāsituṃ śīlaṃ yasya jñānasya tattathā /
T11bsa061_u:705: bhavatu tanmātreṇaiva puruṣaḥ nirākāṅkṣaḥ, kintu kathaṃ tanmātreṇa
T11bsa061_u:714: na tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ yujyate, tadānīṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ
T11bsa061_u:724: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ te anumīyete
T11bsa061_u:735: evaṃ vijñaptijñānānāmubhayorapyavasthayoḥ spandanāyattatvaṃ sādhayitvā svapnāvasthāyāṃ vijñaptijñānād uttarakālabhāvijñānāni yathā spandanāyattāni bhavanti tathā pratipādayitumāha - tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāmityādi /
T11bsa061_u:736: svapnāvasthāyāṃ yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanadhīpatyādudayaḥ, tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi
T11bsa061_u:737: tatra paramparā tvevam - jāgradavasthāyāṃ prathamaṃ tāvat paraspandanādhipatyād vijñaptijñāne, tābhyāṃ prāṇyantarasattāyā anumānam, prāṇyantarasattānumānāt praveśajñānam, tadanu
T11bsa061_u:738: abhivādananamaskārajñāne, tābhyāmapyanu saṃlāpāsanadānādijñānam, tathā ca paṭhanapāṭhanasvādhyāyādijñānāni, tatastāvat kālakrameṇa śayanajñānam,
T11bsa061_u:747: jāgradavasthāyāṃ vijñaptijñānasyāśrayo yatparasantānavartispandanaṃ tasya uttarāvasthā, yā pramātranumānasyottaravartisaṃlāpādivyavahārākārajñānajananasamarthā /
T11bsa061_u:750: syānmatam - bhavatu paramparayotpādaḥ, vyabhicārastu tadavastha eva /
T11bsa061_u:752: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyete /
T11bsa061_u:754: svapnāvasthāyāmapi yādṛk yāvatkālaṃ paracittasya anumānaṃ tādṛk tāvatkālamātraṃ saṃlāpādirūpo
T11bsa061_u:759: ta evaṃ vyācakṣate - tatra svapnāvasthāyāmapi kāryaliṅgasya kāraṇe
T11bsa061_u:767: sākṣāt paracittavidāṃ tu katham? yadi tāvat paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣāt jānanti, tadā tasyārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ syāt /
T11bsa061_u:768: atha na jānanti, kathaṃ te sākṣādvidaḥ?
T11bsa061_u:771: bhavatu tasya prāmāṇyam, ye tu sākṣāt paracittavidaḥ teṣāṃ tu katham? yadi tāvat paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣājjānanti, tadāsya pratyakṣasya grāhyamarthāntaraṃ syāt /
T11bsa061_u:772: atha na jānanti, tadā kathaṃ te yoginaḥ sākṣādvida iti matam // 87 //
T11bsa061_u:775: atha na gṛhyate, kathaṃ tarhi pramaṇamiti cet?
T11bsa061_u:778: yadi arthasvarūpaṃ na gṛhyate, kīdṛk tatpratyakṣam? arthasvarūpāgrahaṇe pramāṇatvaṃ nirākartumāha - atha na gṛhyate kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti /
T11bsa061_u:785: aprahīṇaḥ grāhyagrāhakavikalpo yeṣāṃ yogināṃ teṣāṃ tathā /
T11bsa061_u:786: teṣāṃ yat paracittajñānaṃ tad vyavahāre 'visaṃvādādeva pramāṇam, asmadādisambaddharūpādidarśanavat
T11bsa061_u:792: yadi paracittajñānaṃ na svarūpasya grāhakam, kathaṃ tarhi tat
T11bsa061_u:800: yadyevaṃ cintyeta - bhavatu bhāvanābalādeva yogināṃ paracittajñānam, tena cittasvarūpasyāgrahaṇaṃ tu kathamiti /
T11bsa061_u:806: tat bhāvanābalājjātamapi paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkartuṃ na samartham /
T11bsa061_u:808: yadi yoginaḥ paracittasya svarūpaṃ na jānanti, kathaṃ paracittavida ityavadhāryate cet?
T11bsa061_u:810: yogino 'pi paracittākārasadṛśena svacittapratibhāsenaiva paracittaṃ jānanti [iti paracittavidaḥ]
T11bsa061_u:812: yadi tat svarūpaṃ na gṛhṇāti, kathaṃ tarhi pratyakṣam? kathaṃ ca prāmāṇyamiti cedāha -
T11bsa061_u:815: yasmāt paracittasyākāraṃ sphuṭamanukaroti, tasmāt pratyakṣamiti matam /
T11bsa061_u:817: prahīṇagrāhyagrāhakavikalpānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ yat paracittajñānam, tat paracittasya svarūpaṃ viṣayīkaroti, āhosvinna /
T11bsa061_u:820: atha na karoti, tadā bhagavataḥ jñānamapyayathārtha
T11bsa061_u:822: acintyo hi bhagavataḥ sarvārthādhigamaḥ, sarvathā jñānabhidhānaviṣayātītatvāt /
T11bsa061_u:824: acintyo hi yogivaryāṇāṃ tathā gatānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ /
T11bsa061_u:825: teṣāṃ tu na kevalaṃ paracittajñānamacintyam, api tvaviśeṣeṇa sarvārthasarvākārajñānamapi acintyam /
T11bsa061_u:839: vitatham, tasya grāhyagrāhakavikalpasadbhāvābhyupagamāt, tasya cāvitathatvena darśanāt /
T11bsa061_u:845: tadevaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvārthajñānam eteṣu caturṣu yathāyogaṃ yojanīyam // 93 //
